department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch: 本課程的目標包含讓學生了解數位遊戲式學習研究領域的發展, 以及探討數位遊戲式學習的相關設計原則, 學生需分組實作一個數位遊戲式學習系統.
goal.en: The objectives of this course are to introduce the development of the field of digital game-based learning (DGBL), as well as to discuss design principles of DGBL. Students need to implement a DGBL system with group members.

outline.ch: Introduction to DGBL; Exploring existed systems / platforms / studies; Literature review in games and learning; DGBL theories; Group project: implement a DGBL system
outline.en: Introduction to DGBL; Exploring existed systems / platforms / studies; Literature review in games and learning; DGBL theories; Group project: implement a DGBL system
